General.Description: Bitcore is designed on the foundation of a Bitcoin-based cryptocurrency. Through a snapshot and airdrop process, Bitcore whose capability is 10 MB blocks with Segwit and allows to solve about 17 billion transactions per year. Moreover, it is open-source so it is easy for anyone to enjoy the BTX's platform and applications.
General.Features: There are many features are such as an ASIC resistant PoW algorithm. Moroever, the Timetravel10 has a difficult adjustment called 64_15. In addition, the new snapshot of the Bitcoin network where more than 5 million participants.
General.Technology: On running on wallet version 0.14.1, Bitcore has been launched such as a cryptocurrency by just two add-ons like SegWit. With the blocksize about 20MB, it can make the transactions quickly about 2.5 min blocktime. Bitcore brings about the just two add-on Bloom activated.
